The source code of my portfolio site <a href="https://rz-codes.com" target="_blank">rz-codes.com</a>

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1. **Installation**

   ```shell
   # Clone the code
   git clone https://github.com/rabira-hierpa/rz-codes.com.git
   cd rz-codes.com/
   npm install
   ```

2. **Start developing.**

   Navigate into your new siteâ€™s directory and start it up.

   ```shell
   gatsby develop
   ```

3. **Open the source code and start editing!**

   Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!

   _Note: You'll also see a second link:_`http://localhost:8000/___graphql`_. This is a tool you can use to experiment with querying your data. Learn more about using this tool in the [Gatsby tutorial](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/tutorial/part-five/#introducing-graphiql)._

   Open the `rz-codes.com` directory in your code editor of choice and edit `src/pages/index.js`. Save your changes and the browser will update in real time!
